title: Not Biden, his top advisers should be fired: What family discussed at Camp David
content: Joe Biden opting out of the race is not a possibility now after the Biden family get-together at Camp David Sunday. Biden family members were unanimous in supporting Joe Biden that he should keep fighting. Instead, the role of the advisers wh0 allowed Biden to face Trump in the debate knowing what they must have known is under scrutiny.
summary: Joe Biden opting out of the race is not a possibility now after the Biden family get-together at Camp David Sunday. Biden family members were unanimous in supporting Joe Biden that he should keep fighting. Instead, the role of the advisers wh0 allowed Biden to face Trump in the debate knowing what they must have known is under scrutiny.

title: '90 minutes do not define four years of Joe Biden': First Lady's message loud and clear
content: ​Jill Biden, popularly called as Dr Biden, is under a lot of heat now as Democrat donors are blaming Dr Biden for not asking him to step aside. Billionaire Bill Ackman squarely blamed Dr Biden for dragging Joe Biden into the race for her own interest of being treated like a queen. While the Camp David family meet was supposed to be a brainstorming session on whether Biden should step aside from the race, Jill Biden gave her message loud and clear: She won't give up.
summary: ​Jill Biden, popularly called as Dr Biden, is under a lot of heat now as Democrat donors are blaming Dr Biden for not asking him to step aside. Billionaire Bill Ackman squarely blamed Dr Biden for dragging Joe Biden into the race for her own interest of being treated like a queen. While the Camp David family meet was supposed to be a brainstorming session on whether Biden should step aside from the race, Jill Biden gave her message loud and clear: She won't give up.

title: Pakistan's Karachi reels under hottest period since 2015
content: "With 39.2°C on Sunday, feels like the temperature surges to 55°C at 5 pm. The current weather conditions were the hottest since the 2015 heatwave during which the maximum temperature," Sarfaraz said.
summary: "With 39.2°C on Sunday, feels like the temperature surges to 55°C at 5 pm. The current weather conditions were the hottest since the 2015 heatwave during which the maximum temperature," Sarfaraz said.

title: 19 inmates flee from Pakistan-occupied Kashmir prison, 1 dead
content: Following the Rawalkot prison break, an inquiry committee is established. PM Chaudhry Anwarul Haq takes action against involved officials, suspending some and reassigning others. The incident leads to heightened security measures and search operations in the region.
summary: Following the Rawalkot prison break, an inquiry committee is established. PM Chaudhry Anwarul Haq takes action against involved officials, suspending some and reassigning others. The incident leads to heightened security measures and search operations in the region.

title: China deploys aircraft carrier off Philippine coast amid tensions over South China Sea
7 people, including 4 kids shot in Nebraska; suspect tells them to 'go back where they came from'
content: Nebraska State Patrol revealed in a press conference that the gunman, Billy Booth, fired multiple shots at victims of different ages, causing injuries. The shooting occurred in Crete, with most victims targeted while outside the house. Booth's actions led to injuries to several individuals, including children, in the tragic incident.
summary: Nebraska State Patrol revealed in a press conference that the gunman, Billy Booth, fired multiple shots at victims of different ages, causing injuries. The shooting occurred in Crete, with most victims targeted while outside the house. Booth's actions led to injuries to several individuals, including children, in the tragic incident.

title: Domino's Pizza UK under fire for 'cringe' attempt to join 'Hawk Tuah' trend
Who is Ashwin Ramaswami, first Gen-Z Indian-American candidate to run for US state legislature
Sri Lankan politician Sampanthan passes away
Australia appoints second woman governor-general in 123 years to represent King Charles III
Handover day: China gifts a pair of giant pandas to Hong Kong
content: Hong Kong's city leader, John Lee, announced that China will gift giant pandas to commemorate the 27th anniversary of Hong Kong's return to Chinese control. This gesture symbolizes China's support for the city. Lee highlighted the positive impact of security laws on stability and property market growth, with a GDP target of 2.5% to 3.5% this year.
summary: Hong Kong's city leader, John Lee, announced that China will gift giant pandas to commemorate the 27th anniversary of Hong Kong's return to Chinese control. This gesture symbolizes China's support for the city. Lee highlighted the positive impact of security laws on stability and property market growth, with a GDP target of 2.5% to 3.5% this year.

title: UK general election: Main contenders, key issues; All you need to know
content: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has called for an early general election on July 4, raising the stakes for the Conservative party's 14-year rule. This election could see the end of their governance, potentially ushering in a centre-left Labour government under Keir Starmer. Despite positive economic news, opinion polls favour Labour, highlighting public dissatisfaction with the Conservatives.
summary: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has called for an early general election on July 4, raising the stakes for the Conservative party's 14-year rule. This election could see the end of their governance, potentially ushering in a centre-left Labour government under Keir Starmer. Despite positive economic news, opinion polls favour Labour, highlighting public dissatisfaction with the Conservatives.

title: 'No longer has mental acuity': Billionaire Bill Ackman shifts blame from Biden to First Lady
Increase in juvenile crimes: The shocking way China is reacting to brutal murders of little girls
content: China is facing a surge in violent crimes committed by juveniles, including horrific murders of young girls by boys as young as 12. The country's lenient approach to juvenile offenders, often sending them to mental institutions or allowing them to return to school shortly after the crimes, is under scrutiny.
summary: China is facing a surge in violent crimes committed by juveniles, including horrific murders of young girls by boys as young as 12. The country's lenient approach to juvenile offenders, often sending them to mental institutions or allowing them to return to school shortly after the crimes, is under scrutiny.

title: Australia foreign student visa policy changes: Fees doubled, extension gets difficult
'Extremely dangerous' Hurricane Beryl nears Caribbean, becomes earliest category 4 storm on record
Boeing offered 737 MAX plea deal, lawyer of crash victims' families says
content: Boeing faces scrutiny over the 737 MAX crashes, with the DOJ offering a plea deal involving fines and external oversight. The families of the victims express opposition, pushing for a trial. CEO Dave Calhoun acknowledges the safety crisis and upcoming resignation.
summary: Boeing faces scrutiny over the 737 MAX crashes, with the DOJ offering a plea deal involving fines and external oversight. The families of the victims express opposition, pushing for a trial. CEO Dave Calhoun acknowledges the safety crisis and upcoming resignation.

title: 'Bad debates happen': Allies support Biden, tell him to stay in the race
Setback for Macron: Far Right wins first round of election in France
content: Following the parliamentary election's first round, France faces a pivotal moment with the National Rally party's rise. The political dynamics suggest a significant challenge to President Macron's leadership, prompting discussions of potential alliances and the need for cohesive democratic responses to navigate the evolving landscape effectively.
summary: Following the parliamentary election's first round, France faces a pivotal moment with the National Rally party's rise. The political dynamics suggest a significant challenge to President Macron's leadership, prompting discussions of potential alliances and the need for cohesive democratic responses to navigate the evolving landscape effectively.

title: Mother of war hero questions decision to award Prince Harry the Pat Tillman award
content: The announcement has sparked controversy, including displeasure voiced on air by TV host Pat McAfee and dissatisfaction expressed by the mother of the fallen soldier, who noted she was not consulted about the decision.
summary: The announcement has sparked controversy, including displeasure voiced on air by TV host Pat McAfee and dissatisfaction expressed by the mother of the fallen soldier, who noted she was not consulted about the decision.
